name: plan-maker
description: Agent Foundry Plan Maker - Vite React TypeScript App

scripts.generate:api: npm run generate:api:software-planner && npm run generate:api:spec-clarifier
scripts.generate:api:software-planner: npx openapi-typescript-codegen --input software-planner.openapi.json --output src/api/softwarePlanner --client fetch --useOptions --exportCore false --exportServices false --exportModels true
scripts.generate:api:spec-clarifier: npx openapi-typescript-codegen --input spec-clarifier.openapi.json --output src/api/specClarifier --client fetch --useOptions --exportCore false --exportServices false --exportModels true

author: Created by Agent Foundry and John Brosnihan
